Monster Rancher II FAQ/Walkthrough
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2006 Topics (Year of the Mercury Drop): Monster Rancher II FAQ/Walkthrough
By Kurasu Soratobu on Wednesday, March 8, 2006 - 06:20 pm:

With permission from Lisa, I posted a Monster Rancher II Walkthrough/FAQ and Combination FAQ on GameFAQs. I invite people to take a look and A) tell me if there's anything that needs to be fixed, and B) tell me if there's something that's mentioned there that you'd rather not be. As far as I'm concerned, MRM is where I got a lot of my info from, so if you want me to hold back information, its your prerogative; people can be directed to MRM instead simply enough.

For those of you who's found the info and are willing to let me use it in the Walkthrough/Faq(s), thank you all over again!
